Chinese research vessels operating in the Indian OceanChina's scientific survey fleet of ships is growing and although the government insists the vessels are for research purposes only, some Asian neighbours, especially India, are concerned sensitive data they gather might be shared with the Chinese military. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 07:34:14 GMT FHXST5KSIZP5FLRWVWBFUX3KDE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-research-vessels-operating-indian-ocean-2024-02-22/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korea foreign minister to meet Blinken in US this monthSouth Korea's foreign minister Cho Tae-yul will visit the United States and hold a meeting with his counterpart Antony Blinken on February 28, the ministry said on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 06:35:46 GMT A5VVM3J6OVMZJFCCI3EQYJKLXU https://www.reuters.com/world/south-korea-foreign-minister-meets-blink-us-this-month-2024-02-22/Reuters世界
Thousands ordered to flee while they can as bushfire burns in Australia's southMore than two thousand people have been ordered to evacuate from towns in the west of Australia's Victoria state due to a bushfire burning out of control on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 06:32:56 GMT RW744SALES7PILGYICDARD7MI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/thousands-ordered-flee-while-they-could-bushfire-burns-south-australia-2024-02-22/Reuters商业环境
How life in Ukraine has been shattered by two years of warWives have become widows, parents long for captured sons, classrooms are empty and farmers can't find the hands to work the land. Unlikely friendships have formed; old ones have fallen apart. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 06:09:41 GMT TIKVFA63SNMI5GVXCM66SWBEVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/how-life-in-ukraine-has-been-shattered-by-two-years-of-war-2024-02-22/Charlotte Bruneau世界欧洲
Turkey calls for Gaza ceasefire, two-state solution at G20 meetingTurkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan called on the international community to take a more active role towards an urgent ceasefire in Gaza and a two-state solution to the conflict during talks at the G20 meeting in Brazil, a Turkish diplomatic source said. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 05:57:54 GMT TRGGZ4VXLNAMEVFNWJAT4ULILBU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-calls-two-state-solution-g20-meeting-2024-02-22/Reuters世界中东地区
Palestinian gunmen kill one person on West Bank highway- policeThree Palestinians opened fire at motorists near an Israeli checkpoint in the occupied West Bank near Jerusalem on Thursday, killing one person and wounding five others, emergency services said. Chile risks repeat of deadly wildfires because of climate change, report saysDeadly wildfires like those that burned through central Chile and killed at least 133 people this month will become more likely in the South American country as climate change makes the world hotter and drier, according to a report released on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 05:17:03 GMT MOYF5LWBQBJRNDHDVV67Q5MYK4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/chile-risks-repeat-deadly-wildfires-because-of-climate-change-report-says-2024-02-22/Alexander Villegas可持续发展气候与能源
Two killed after barge hits bridge near China's Guangzhou, plunging vehicles in waterTwo people were killed after a barge collided with a bridge over a waterway in China's Pearl River Delta near Guangzhou city, causing part of the bridge to break off, plunging vehicles into the water, Chinese state media reported on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 05:08:17 GMT OPSBUSO5NK6HBB3TWI7QZSZVY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/two-killed-after-barge-hits-bridge-near-chinas-guangzhou-plunging-vehicles-water-2024-02-22/Liz Lee, Bernard Orr世界中国
Israel sounds sirens in Eilat, intercepts aerial targetIsrael's military said it intercepted a target in the area of the Red Sea on Thursday after sirens warning of incoming rockets and missiles sounded in the southern city of Eilat. Maldives visit of Chinese survey ship could trigger Indian Ocean security concernsA Chinese research ship is set to arrive in the Maldives on Thursday, global ship-tracking data showed, just three months after a similar vessel visited the Indian Ocean and sparked New Delhi's security concerns. Philippine coast guard says Chinese claim of intrusion 'inaccurate'A Philippine coast guard official on Thursday described as "inaccurate" its Chinese counterpart's claim that a fisheries vessel "illegally intruded" into Beijing's waters.
